public int bm(char[] a, int n, char[] b, int m) {

  generateBC(b, m, bc); // æ„å»ºåå­—ç¬¦å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨

  while (i <= n - m) {

      if (a[i+j] != b[j]) break; // åå­—ç¬¦å¯¹åº”æ¨¡å¼ä¸²ä¸­çš„ä¸‹æ ‡æ˜¯j
    }
    if (j < 0) {

    }

    if (j < m-1) { // å¦‚æœæœ‰å¥½åç¼€çš„è¯

}

private int moveByGS(int j, int m, int[] suffix, boolean[] prefix) {
  int k = m - 1 - j; // å¥½åç¼€é•¿åº¦
  if (suffix[k] != -1) return j - suffix[k] +1;
  for (int r = j+2; r <= m-1; ++r) {

    }
  }

}

public int search(String txt) {
int m = pat.length();
int n = txt.length();
int skip;
for (int i = 0; i <= n - m; i += skip) {
skip = 0;
for (int j = m -1; j >= 0 ; j--) {
if (pat.charAt(j) != txt.charAt(i + j)) {
skip = Math.max(1, j - right[txt.charAt(i + j)]);
}
}
// found
if (skip == 0) {
return i;
}
}
// not found
return n;
}

public static int badCharacterRule(String s, String p, int index) {
int pIndex = p.length() - 1;

for(int i = index + p.length() - 1; i >= index; i--){
if(s.charAt(i) == p.charAt(pIndex)){
pIndex--;

if(badCharIndex < 0){

i = i - badCharIndex;
return i;
}
}
}

return index;
}
